sentence: In one of the patients with PMF, mainly megakaryocytes were identified as producing TGF-beta1 and TNF-alpha, the fibrosis-stimulating cytokines, VGEF, bFGF, PDGF, and IL-2 (Figure 1).

Herein, we present three representative cases of positive immunohistochemical staining of the tumor/other cells for TGF-beta1: a case of AML (Case No.10, Figure 2), a case of DLBCL (Case No.45, Figure 3) and case of DLBCL (Case No.28, Figure 4).

Open in a new tab
Case 10, AML: Myelofibrosis and fibroblast-stimulating cytokines identified by immunohistochemistry in bone marrow tissue
A, B: HE staining showing bone marrow fibrosis (MF); C, D: Positive staining for silver MF grade 2-3; E, F: Positive immunostaining for TGF-beta1 in macrophages and megakaryocytes; G, H: Positive staining for TNF-alpha1 in macrophages and megakaryocytes.Fig. 3.

Open in a new tab
Case 45, DLBCL: Fibrosis and fibroblast-stimulating cytokines identified by immunohistochemistry in bone marrow tissue
A, B: HE staining showing bone marrow fibrosis (MF); C, D: Positive staining for silver; E, F: Positive staining of the DLBCL cells for TGF-beta1; G, H: Negative staining for TNF-alpha1.Fig. 4.
In one of the patients with PMF, mainly megakaryocytes were identified as producing TGF-beta1 and TNF-alpha, the fibrosis-stimulating cytokines, VGEF, bFGF, PDGF, and IL-2 (Figure 1).

Herein, we present three representative cases of positive immunohistochemical staining of the tumor/other cells for TGF-beta1: a case of AML (Case No.10, Figure 2), a case of DLBCL (Case No.45, Figure 3) and case of DLBCL (Case No.28, Figure 4).

Herein, we present three representative cases of positive immunohistochemical staining of the tumor/other cells for TGF-beta1: a case of AML (Case No.10, Figure 2), a case of DLBCL (Case No.45, Figure 3) and case of DLBCL (Case No.28, Figure 4).
